fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check a player to learn if they are the same subalignment as your previous target.
- (Rehearsal) Check a player to see if they would win with your previous target, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Check a player. If they are the same faction as your previous target, attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: 3**
- For the normal ability, I mean *only* subalignment. A Town (Evil) and Coven (Evil) will show as being the same subalignment.
- You may select a target on D1. If you don't, it's randomized so your ability may function. It will never be a Band member.
- If your previous target is dead, they stay your previous target. Even if you killed them.
